scheme_name: Indira Mahila Shakti Prashikshan Evam Koshal Sanvardhan Yojana (RS-CSEP)
description: The Indira Mahila Shakti Prashikshan Evam Koshal Sanvardhan Yojana (RS-CSEP) in Rajasthan provides free training in spoken English and personality development to women and girls to enhance their employability and confidence.

residency_criteria: Must be a resident of Rajasthan

eligible_activities: Career counseling and job placement activities

steps: Obtain the application form from the District Women Empowerment Department
Submit the application with proof of eligibility
Attach required documents, including Aadhaar and education certificate
Applications are reviewed by the department
Selected candidates are enrolled in training programs
application_process.note: Applicants must attend an orientation session

special_notes: Training is conducted in batches at district centers
Priority is given to economically disadvantaged women
